tool_description: This API provides technical analysis of stocks using Generative AI (ChatGPT). Also, gives buy/sell/hold recommendations based on the analysis. You can also get prediction of future share price for stocks.
name: Sai's Stock Analyzer
title: Sai's Stock Analyzer

api_list.name: FindStocks

required_parameters.name: search_term
required_parameters.description: search_term  is the search term to search stock code or company name starting with the search_term. You must enter at least three characters in search_term.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: Exchange code for the Stock Exchange for example NYQ for Nasdaq. exchange must be of 3 characters. To get list of all Exchanges supported, call SupportedExchanges endpoint.

api_list.name: SupportedExchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sais-stock-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/SupportedExchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sais-stock-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sais-stock-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com/SupportedExchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sais-stock-analyzer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: AnalysisReport

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: Exchange code for the Stock Exchange for example NYQ for Nasdaq. exchange must be of 3 characters. To get list of all Exchanges supported, call SupportedExchanges endpoint.

required_parameters.name: stock_code
required_parameters.description: The stock codes used here is same as Yahoo Finance tickers to maintain ease of use. You can also find the desired stock_code using FindStocks endpoint provided.
